lines.text: You're the worst kind of freak, one who tries to control it.
Ladies and gentlemen, it's time to meet the devil!
But I don't wanna look like this!
[Ian, a werewolf, is exhibited as part of a freak show]
You see, Sheriff, I'm the new entertainment.
Satan's work shall not go unpunished!
Don't move or I'll shoot your dick into the next county!

I found you! I've been waiting. You can do whatever you wanna do. You can keep me here. You can let me go. Doesn't matter. It won't change anything. It won't stop it! Because you're dead. You're dead.
one who tries to control it. But you can't! You can't deny your true nature.
Leave here, Winston. You don't belong. The world is full of freaks, but you're not one of them.
I don't understand. This is... It's the only place I'm not a freak.
No! This is the only place where you are one.
